3 namespace Ubiquity\annotations;
4 
5 use Ubiquity\utils\base\UArray;
6 use mindplay\annotations\Annotation;
7 
12 class BaseAnnotation extends Annotation {
13 
14  public function getProperties() {
15  $reflect = new \ReflectionClass ( $this );
16  $props = $reflect->getProperties ();
17  return $props;
18  }
19 
20  public function getPropertiesAndValues($props = NULL) {
21  $ret = array ();
22  if (is_null ( $props ))
23  $props = $this->getProperties ( $this );
24  foreach ( $props as $prop ) {
25  $prop->setAccessible ( true );
26  $v = $prop->getValue ( $this );
27  if ($v !== null && $v !== "" && isset ( $v )) {
28  $ret [$prop->getName ()] = $v;
29  }
30  }
31  return $ret;
32  }
33 
34  public function asPhpArray() {
35  $fields = $this->getPropertiesAndValues ();
36  return UArray::asPhpArray ( $fields );
37  }
38 
39  public function initAnnotation(array $properties) {
40  foreach ( $properties as $name => $value ) {
41  if (is_array ( $this->$name )) {
42  if (is_array ( $value )) {
43  foreach ( $value as $k => $v ) {
44  $this->$name [$k] = $v;
45  }
46  } else {
47  $this->$name [] = $value;
48  }
49  } else {
50  $this->$name = $value;
51  }
52  }
53  }
54 
55  protected function asAnnotation() {
56  return $this->asPhpArray ();
57  }
58 
59  public function __toString() {
60  $extsStr = $this->asAnnotation ();
61  $className = get_class ( $this );
62  $annotName = \substr ( $className, \strlen ( "Ubiquity\annotations\\" ) );
63  $annotName = \substr ( $annotName, 0, \strlen ( $annotName ) - \strlen ( "Annotation" ) );
64  return "@" . \lcfirst ( $annotName ) . $extsStr;
65  }
66 }
